Articles.Content:
Hello,

I've started writing things on this forum and I though it would be nice to also say hello, so here I am.

I've played KSP for about 3 weeks, if I remember right. I've got to every planet and moon, but now I've got a little bored of the orbital mechanics part of the game, so most of the time I just build crazy stuff.

You can see some of my crazy stuff on my twitch channel (check the highlights). I also stream almost everyday.

See you around,

Aphobius
And I'll see you around . But seriously, 3 weeks and already been to all the planets? I guess I play campaign-style so that's a unrealistic time frame. Anyway good job!
